page.title: 09SPORTS FACILITIES NUNTHORPE
page.content: Situated on Guisborough Rd. is the{ {Nunthorpe Sports Complex.}The complex has football, cricket and quoits pitches and tennis and squash courts. The 4 squash courts are housed in a building which also contains changing rooms and a bar. Also in Nunthorpe near the railway station is the bowling green of{Nunthorpe Bowling {Club.}Along Brass Castle Lane can be found the 140 acre golf course and club house of{Middlesbrough Golf Club. The club has around 900 members and the membership fee for an adult is Â£190 a year. The course is of 18 holes. The longest is the 8th at 522 yards, the shortest the 10th at 135 yards. Par for the course is 70 and the course record score 62. The upkeep of the course is a skilled operation undertaken by the head greenkeeper and his 4 assistants.
